name: Oddish

name: Vileplume
AbilityText: Each player can't play any Item cards from his or her hand.

name: Bellossom
Attack1Text: Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Move as many Grass Energy attached to your Pokemon to your other Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Spinarak
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Ariados
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. Both Active Pokemon (except for Grass Pokemon) are now Poisoned.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Vespiquen
Attack1Text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Pokemon in your discard pile.

name: Vespiquen
Attack1Text: Heal from this Pokemon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Virizion
Attack1Text: Put 2 Pokemon from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Flareon
AbilityText: Each of your Stage 1 Pokemon in play is now a Fire Pokemon in addition to its existing types.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Entei
Attack1Text: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. If any of those cards are Fire Energy cards, attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Entei
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Volcarona
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Then, search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to that Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Volcarona
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Magikarp
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Gyarados
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Gyarados
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on each of your Benched Magikarp.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage. If tails, this Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Vaporeon
AbilityText: Each of your Stage 1 Pokemon in play is now a Water Pokemon in addition to its existing types.

name: Relicanth

Attack2Text: This Pokemon does 10 damage to itself.

name: Regice
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon by Pokemon-EX.

name: Jolteon

Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Rotom
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, choose a random card from your opponent's hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into his or her deck.

name: Unown
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokemon is on your Bench, you may discard this Pokemon and all cards attached to it (this does not count as a Knock Out). If you do, draw a card.

name: Baltoy
Attack1Text: Look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.

name: Claydol

name: Golett
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Regirock

name: Golurk

name: Inkay
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Metagross

name: Metagross

name: Kirlia

name: Cottonee

name: Goomy

Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Goodra

name: Meowth
